EN: Currently a lecturer at the School of Computer Science at Nanjing University of Posts and Telecommunications. Graduated in December 2024 from the School of Computer and Information at Hefei University of Technology with a Ph.D. in Engineering (supervised by Professor Yu Kui). From October 2023 to October 2024, conducted collaborative research as a joint Ph.D. student sponsored by the China Scholarship Council at the School of Computer Science and Engineering, Nanyang Technological University, Singapore (supervised by Professor Han Yu). Selected for the inaugural China Association for Science and Technology Young Talent Lifting Project - Doctoral Student Special Program (supporting society: China Computer Federation), and received the Outstanding Student Paper Award at FL@FM-NeurIPS'24. Research interests focus on artificial intelligence and data mining, with particular emphasis on causal discovery, federated learning, and feature selection, aiming to address issues of interpretability and privacy protection in artificial intelligence models. In recent years, published nearly 20 academic papers in prestigious international journals such as IEEE TKDE, ACM CSUR, IEEE TNNLS, ACM TIST, IEEE TBD, IEEE TAI, and top-tier international conferences, including AAAI, IJCAI, CIKM, with 10 papers as first author (including 5 CCF-A papers). Serves as a reviewer for top international conferences in artificial intelligence and data mining, including NeurIPS, ICML, ICLR, AAAI, IJCAI, ECAI, ICDM, and authoritative international journals such as IEEE TKDE, IEEE TNNLS, ACM TKDD, IEEE TCSVT, and Machine Learning. Currently leads projects, including the National Natural Science Youth Foundation of China, the Jiangsu Provincial Natural Science Youth Foundation, the Natural Science Foundation of the Jiangsu Higher Education Institutions of China (Category A), and the Anhui Provincial New Era Educational Quality Engineering Project for Graduate Academic Innovation. Participated in multiple projects, including the National Science and Technology Major Project for New Generation Artificial Intelligence by the Ministry of Science and Technology and National Natural Science Foundation of China General Projects.
CN: 现任南京邮电大学计算机学院、软件学院、网络空间安全学院讲师，2024年12月毕业于合肥工业大学计算机与信息学院，获工学博士学位（导师：俞奎教授）。2023年10月至2024年10月作为国家公派联合培养博士生在新加坡南洋理工大学计算与数据科学学院从事合作研究（导师：Han Yu教授）。入选首届中国科协青年人才托举工程博士生专项计划（托举学会：中国计算机学会），荣获FL@FM-NeurIPS'24优秀学生论文奖。主要从事人工智能、数据挖掘领域研究，重点关注因果发现、联邦学习、特征选择等方向，致力于解决人工智能模型的可解释性、隐私保护等问题。近年来在IEEE TKDE、ACM CSUR、IEEE TNNLS、ACM TIST、IEEE TBD、IEEE TAI等国际重要期刊，以及AAAI、IJCAI、CIKM等国际顶级会议上发表近20篇学术论文，其中以第一作者身份发表10篇（含CCF-A类论文5篇）。担任人工智能与数据挖掘领域NeurIPS、ICML、ICLR、AAAI、IJCAI、ECAI、ICDM等国际顶级会议和IEEE TKDE、IEEE TNNLS、ACM TKDD、IEEE TCSVT、Machine Learning等国际权威期刊的审稿人。主持国家自然科学基金青年项目、江苏省自然科学基金青年项目、江苏省高等学校自然科学研究面上项目-A类、安徽省新时代育人质量工程项目-研究生学术创新等，参与科技部新一代人工智能国家科技重大专项、国家自然科学基金面上项目等多项项目。
